snippet: In a borough that has become a globally recognized icon of cool, residents are watching the renaissance with resentment and indifference.
abstract: Gentrification and transformation of Brooklyn in recent years is leaving some longtime residents in the borough's unaffected corners feeling left out; many in neighborhoods like Brownsville and Sheepshead Bay are watching the renaissance with a mixture of amusement, nervousness and even dismay, worried that they are being left behind in the quest for better jobs and housing.
lead_paragraph: In a borough that has become a globally recognized icon of cool, residents are watching the renaissance with resentment and indifference.

headline.seo: As Brooklyn Gentrifies, Some Neighborhoods Are Being Left Behind
headline.main: As Brooklyn Gentrifies, Some Neighborhoods Are Being Left Behind
headline.print_headline: As Brooklyn Gentrifies, Some Neighborhoods Are Being Left Behind
